props.code:
module.exports = {
  chainWebpack: config => {
    config.module
      .rule('mdx')
      .test(/\.mdx?$/)
      .use('babel-loader')
        .loader('babel-loader')
        .options({plugins: ['@vue/babel-plugin-jsx'], /* Other optionsâ€¦ */})
        .end()
      .use('@mdx-js/loader')
        .loader('@mdx-js/loader')
        .options({jsx: true, /* otherOptionsâ€¦ */})
        .end()
  },
}

children.value:
module.exports = {
  chainWebpack: config => {
    config.module
      .rule('mdx')
      .test(/\.mdx?$/)
      .use('babel-loader')
        .loader('babel-loader')
        .options({plugins: ['@vue/babel-plugin-jsx'], /* Other optionsâ€¦ */})
        .end()
      .use('@mdx-js/loader')
        .loader('@mdx-js/loader')
        .options({jsx: true, /* otherOptionsâ€¦ */})
        .end()
  },
}
